amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record which seeks to increase funding for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program by $50 million. The amendment seeks to reduce funding for operations, research and facilities at NOAA by $50 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dreier amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 195 (Roll no. 250).
